mapper.select: select MNSHAHODINFSGMTSEQNO, SHARHODINFSEQNO, SHARHODTYPE, SHARHODCERTTYPE, SHARHODNAME, SHARHODIDTYPE, SHARHODIDNUM, INVRATIO,ReportFlag from PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFSHAHODINF
mapper.insert: insert into pbcrs_report_EnBasInfShaHodInm ( MNSHAHODINFSGMTSEQNO, SHARHODINFSEQNO, SHARHODTYPE, SHARHODCERTTYPE, SHARHODNAME, SHARHODIDTYPE, SHARHODIDNUM, INVRATIO,ReportFlag,etl_date ) select MNSHAHODINFSGMTSEQNO, SHARHODINFSEQNO, SHARHODTYPE, SHARHODCERTTYPE, SHARHODNAME, SHARHODIDTYPE, SHARHODIDNUM, INVRATIO,'0',to_date(to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd'),'yyyy-mm-dd') from PBCRS_REPORT_ENBASINFSHAHODINF where MNSHAHODINFSGMTSEQNO=#{MnShaHodInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
